title: Water Powered Brush
description: The Water Powered Brush uses high-pressure water jets to dislodge dirt and grime without damaging surfaces. Its soft-bristle head is perfect for sensitive materials like solar panels and car exteriors. This tool is easy to connect to any standard garden hose, making it a must-have for eco-conscious cleaners.

title: Installation Tool
description: The Installation Tool is a compact, ergonomic device designed to make solar panel mounting a breeze. With a non-slip grip and magnetic interchangeable heads, it's the perfect companion for any solar technician or DIY enthusiast tackling their own green energy projects.

title: Solar Powered Brush
description: The Solar Powered Brush is a self-sustaining cleaning tool designed specifically for solar panels. Powered by sunlight, it automatically rotates and scrubs away dust and debris. Reduce maintenance costs and maximize solar output with this autonomous cleaner.
specifications: Power: Solar panel with battery backup

title: Cleaning Kit
description: An all-in-one Cleaning Kit featuring multiple brushes, microfiber cloths, and eco-safe cleaning fluid. Designed for maximum compatibility with glass, panels, and plastics, it ensures a streak-free, scratch-resistant clean every time.
specifications: Kit Includes: 3 brushes, 2 cloths, 1 spray bottle

title: Suction Cup
description: Heavy-duty Suction Cup designed for safely lifting and positioning glass panels and other flat surfaces. Industrial strength grip with quick-release functionality for efficiency and safety during installs.
specifications: Material: Industrial silicone and ABS plastic

title: Solar Tool Roller
description: The Solar Tool Roller simplifies the transportation of heavy solar panels across roofs and work areas. With rugged wheels and a low-friction bed, it's engineered to reduce strain and speed up installations.
idealFor: Moving solar panels during large installs
